auth.get-started: To get started, only a name is required

welcome.title: Welcome aboard
welcome.help-1: Congratulations, your Berty account is now created and you can chat with other people on the Berty network.
welcome.help-2: To make your Berty experience the best possible we will help you receive notifications, find people you know and backup your account.
welcome.disclaimer: Just to let you know, this will slightly lower the confidentiality of your account, if you want to stay off the radar you can skip any these steps.

notifications.title: Express bottle deliveries
notifications.help: Let the messages find you instantly, you can receive notifications from the people you added as contacts.
notifications.disclaimer-apple: Your messages will be encrypted and sent through Berty and Apple servers. Neither Berty nor Apple will have access to your messages, but some metadata can be deduced.
notifications.disclaimer-google: Your messages will be encrypted and sent through Berty and Google servers. Neither Berty nor Google will have access to your messages, but some metadata can be deduced.

contacts.title: Join the crew
contacts.link-help: You can send an invite link to your contacts now, or you can do it anytime in the settings
contacts.link-disclaimer: You will be sharing your account via a text message or an email, we won't access your contacts
contacts.phone-help: To let your contacts find you, you can link your phone number to your Berty account, we will ask access to your address book to let you know who is already registered on Berty
contacts.phone-disclaimer: A fingerprint version of your phone number will be stored on Berty servers, but we won't be able to use it to contact anyone

backup.title: Keep your key safe
backup.help: Your private key is your identity on Berty. Write down 10 words to retrieve access to it.
backup.disclaimer: While it is recommended to backup your private key now, you can do it later in the app settings. However keep in mind that you will be able to do it once. Store it securely, anyone with your key will be able to use your account.

settings.title: Settings
settings.notifications-not-supported: Notifications are not currently supported on this platform
settings.push-berty-google-firebase-servers: Via Berty and Google's Firebase servers
settings.update-write-fail: Unable to download app, not allowed to write file
settings.update-write-perm-desc: This permission is required to download the application update

chats.title: Chats
chats.name: Name
chats.link-invite: Invite to group with a link (not implem.)

contacts.title: Contacts
contacts.empty: You don't have any contacts yet

add.title: Add a contact
add.pub-key-paste-here: Paste the public key of a Berty user here
add.qrcode-not-from-berty: This is not a Berty QR Code
add.invite-text-link: Use this link to add {{displayName}} on Berty {{url}}
add.invite-text-link-self: Use this link to add me on Berty {{url}}

contacts.add-action-feedback: A request has been sent to this contact
contacts.resend-action-feedback: Contact request has been sent again
contacts.block-confirm-question: Are you sure you want to block this contact?
contacts.save-qrcode-action-feedback: The QR Code has been added to your Camera Roll

fatal-unexpected-error: An unexpected error occurred, please restart the application
